mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client_message_data ( id , version , message_key , message_topic , message_body , delay_level , status , creator , creator_id , created_time , last_operator , last_operator_id , update_time ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{version} , #{messageKey} , #{messageTopic} , #{messageBody} , #{delayLevel} , #{status} , #{creator} , #{creatorId} , #{createdTime} , #{lastOperator} , #{lastOperatorId} , #{updateTime} )
